name: Kin'emon
text: Activate: Main | Once Per Turn: When you have 1 or less Characters in play, reduce the play cost of the next 3 cost or higher {Wano Country} type Character card you play from your hand by 1 during this turn.

effect.text: When you have 1 or less Characters in play, reduce the play cost of the next 3 cost or higher {Wano Country} type Character card you play from your hand by 1 during this turn.
conditions: You have 1 or less Characters in play
